backend/main.mo: Defines emergency report types, stores reports in a map, and provides functions to create and query reports.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short human-written summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads the root container and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/ai/analyzeEmergency.ts: Implements keyword-based emergency classification, severity estimation, and dispatch message generation.
frontend/src/ai/systemPrompt.ts: Exports the system prompt used for AI emergency analysis with strict JSON output rules.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app layout and routing for intake, preview, status, dashboard, and incident pages.
frontend/src/components/DepartmentIcon.t: Renders department-specific icons for Police, Ambulance, and Fire Station.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a footer with branding, copyright, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation buttons for reporting emergencies and accessing the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/SeverityBadge.ts: Reusable badge component that displays severity with color-coded styling.
frontend/src/components/StatusStepper.ts: Renders a vertical stepper showing emergency status progression with timestamps and current state highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocation.ts: Provides browser geolocation retrieval with stored coordinates, formatted address, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing identity, login, logout, and status tracking through a context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps report creation, analysis retrieval, dispatch updates, and status polling using react-query and local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceInput.ts: Implements continuous speech-to-text input using the Web Speech API with controls for listening state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables for themes and severity levels.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/DispatchPreviewPage.t: Shows analysis results for a report and allows confirming dispatch, handling loading, errors, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DispatchStatusPage.ts: Displays real-time dispatch status updates with periodic polling and shows department responses and progress.
frontend/src/pages/IncidentDetailsPage.t: Shows detailed incident analysis, metadata, and progress for a specific report.
frontend/src/pages/ReportIntakePage.tsx: Collects emergency report info including text, media, location, and contact details, then submits it.
frontend/src/pages/ResponderDashboardPag: Lists and filters all reports for responders, sorted by severity, with navigation to individual incidents.
frontend/src/state/reportPersistence.ts: Provides localStorage utilities for saving, retrieving, and listing stored emergency reports.
frontend/src/state/statusEngine.ts: Manages simulated status progression for reports based on severity-driven timing and updates history.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended theming, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
